actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude each year $10,000 of pensions and annuities from the gross income of individuals who have attained age 65.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude each year a maximum of $10,000 of pensions and annuities from the gross income of individuals who have attained aged 65. Provides that such exclusion shall be applied separately with respect to a husband and wife.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude each year $10,000 of pensions and annuities from the gross income of individuals who have attained age 65.
